lines: #SKIP ON TO THE NEXT LIFE STAGE
Are you SURE you want to start your entire game over again?  Your current stored life will be erased.
OK, your game has been reset.
Are you sure you want to skip on to the next life stage?  You might miss something in the current one.
#YES, TAKE ME TO THE NEXT LEVEL
OK, you're on your way to the next life stage.
You're already on the last life stage.  You can't skip on to the next one.
